Texts.Eng: Just poke at that there console and you'll be in no sweat.
Now I've just finished setting them beauties of charges...a good bang to them, and they go with a minimum of noise.
Oh, you're <entityname>. Shore base radioed me to let you know you were coming, took you long enough.
They be discharging their effluent straight into the ocean, but I guess they can't mess this rock up any worse, aye?
Took me a little while to dig all quiet-like, but I've managed to expose part of the facility's waste system.
